citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
In the whelping building there is a female yorkshire terrier, no identification number was found, who's right ear is
red, inflamed and has a discharge coming from it. The licensee said the dog has not been evaluated by a
veterinarian. Poor ear health can cause pain and discomfort to the dog. This dog must be evaluated by a licensed
veterinarian in order to ensure proper diagnosis and an appropriate treatment plan is developed. Diagnosis and
treatment must be documented and available to inspector upon request.
Correct by: 09/19/14
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
In the whelping building there is a female yorkshire terrier, no identification number was found,  who's right ear is
red, inflamed and has a discharge coming from it.  The licensee said the dog has not been evaluated by a
veterinarian.  Poor ear health can cause pain and discomfort to the dog.  This dog must be evaluated by a licensed
veterinarian in order to ensure proper diagnosis and an appropriate treatment plan is developed.  Diagnosis and
treatment must be documented and available to inspector upon request.
Correct by:  09/19/14
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
